resources.string: J-Server

A open-source sync server for Octi made by a friend. Data is encrypted client-side, only your devices can decrypt it.\n\nAs both the app and the server are still being improved, it may be less stable than other sync options.
Inactive accounts are deleted after a few weeks.
Add new Google Drive
You will need access to another device that is already linked.
About JServer
JServer is an open-source sync server for Octi by Jakob MÃ¶ller.
